casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Henry RAINES. No. 211A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 31, 2006. Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for Raines. Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of October 2006 by Defendant to Bypass the Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 31st day of October 2006."
